body_html: It was my mistake didn't catch that build_ext is invoked after "install" tries to install the headers to python lib dir. #5754 introduced better error handling and the test start failing with exception which was not caught earlier. Copying the headers under build_deps solves the problem for all the cases.
body_text: It was my mistake didn't catch that build_ext is invoked after "install" tries to install the headers to python lib dir. #5754 introduced better error handling and the test start failing with exception which was not caught earlier. Copying the headers under build_deps solves the problem for all the cases.
body: It was my mistake didn't catch that build_ext is invoked after "install" tries to install the headers to python lib dir. #5754 introduced better error handling and the test start failing with exception which was not caught earlier. Copying the headers under build_deps solves the problem for all the cases.
